name: autocomplete
description: Provides automatic input completion or suggestions for text input fields and textareas.
author: rgrove

examples.name: ac-local
examples.description: How to provide autocomplete suggestions from a local array.

examples.name: ac-jsonp
examples.description: How to provide autocomplete suggestions using a remote JSONP source.

examples.name: ac-yql
examples.description: How to provide autocomplete suggestions using a YQL query source.

examples.name: ac-datasource
examples.description: How to provide autocomplete suggestions using a DataSource instance.

examples.name: ac-tagging
examples.description: How to implement delimited tag completion.

examples.name: ac-flickr
examples.displayName: Find Photos on Flickr (Custom Formatting, YQL Source)
examples.description: How to find and select Flickr photos using a YQL source and a custom autocomplete result formatter.

examples.name: ac-filter
examples.displayName: Filter a Set of Existing Items on a Page
examples.description: How to use autocomplete-base to filter a set of existing items on a page.
